评论详情: So I definitely think this outfit is super cute and my 4 year old loved the design as well. However, the material is just flat out awful. I hate this new fad of fast fashion cheap non breathable knock off silky fabric that's being used on everything now. My daughter almost immediately wants to take this outfit off due to the suffocating feeling it creates. The material is not breathable in the slightest and the kind of silky feel causes all of the body heat to get trapped inside the outfit and you almost instantly start to sweat. How do I know this? Because I have been trying on clothes from places like amazon for a while now hoping to find a cheaper alternative to clothes but I have been so disappointed in quality of all of these trending fabrics. Back to shopping at tj maxx I go because this is not it. I have found many outfits made from this same type material and I immediately start to have hot flashes the second I put it on. That's the same issue my child had with this outfit and several others bought from amazon as well. So my advice...steer clear of the fast fashion fabrics pouring into amazon and if you're on a budget ross is just as cheap and way better quality. Don't buy this crap.

评论详情: Pros: •Adorable Design: Cute tie-dye hoodie with heart print adds a fun and trendy touch. •Comfortable Fit: Soft fabric and cozy hoodie ensure comfort for active toddlers. •Versatile Outfit: Perfect for casual outings, playdates, or lounging at home. •Durable: The set is well-made and holds up well after washing.  Cons: •Sizing Issues: The set runs either too large or small, depending on build. •Material Thinness: The fabric might feel a bit thin for cooler weather.

I got this set for my 4-year-old daughter. It is cute; pretty much the same as advertised. The material is soft and warm, and the fit was good. My daughter likes wearing it to daycare. The price is reasonable, and overall, I recommend this product.

Your little girl will be a true fashionista in this adorable tie dye sweatshirt and jogger pants.  Great colors and style.  The material is soft and made quit well.  Perfect for a large range of ages as well.  Fit true to size.

The material is lightweight, breathable, and perfect for sunny autumn day/evening.  My little 2 year old loves the hoodie and I love how it looks on her.  Also, the quality of it is great, as it has held up well thru multiple washes.  A great buy!!!

This is a really cute toddler sweatsuit.  The material is on the thin side and I sized up for my toddler but the pants are almost too short.  I would say this is great if your toddler is shorter, otherwise you risk sizing twice for questionable fit.

The colors came just as above with nice breathable mesh. It’s stretchable and gives a perfect fit to run around and play in. The head space was a bit small but no worries with a few tugs to stretch it. The dye does not bleed when washing so that’s a major plus.

I ordered this hoping for a warm jumpsuit that would keep my daughter warm. Unfortunately, this is not it. Yes, it's long sleeves/pants and has a hood, but the material is super thin. It's NOT sweatpants and a sweatshirt, as the title suggests!! It's not even the soft buttery material I've come to expect from something being marketed as "joggers." It feels closer to loose exercise wear.  Nonetheless, my daughter LOVES the colors and design, and she thinks it's so cool that the shirt and pants match. So it's a decent find in the style regard, but if you're looking for warm, look elsewhere.
The sweatsuit fits true to size. Its material is comfortable and soft. Washes and dries in machine well.  The colors are vibrant and perfect for fall!
This is an excellent outfit. True to size. Laundered well. Good value. Highly recommend.

This outfit is super cute! The moment I took it out of its package our daughter asked if she could wear it and immediately ran to her room so she could put it on. Both the pants and hood fit her really well, and the material is really soft on the inside. The pattern is super cute and I like it a lot more than I expected I would. The elastic on the pants is solid as well, I was worried it might not be very tight and she'd have issues with the pants sagging, but it holds really well.
